short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the rating bars from IMDB, Goodreads, MyAnimeList and Letterboxd.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It also provides a separate toggle option for IMDB, Goodreads, MyAnimeList and Letterboxd, so you can always turn it on/off for the preferred site.

Link to the GitHub repo - https://github.com/ganigeorgiev/hide-ratings-extension
